Text.val: 11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
06.06.2011 SH SCR16020 Increased performance of OPH101C6 and added filter on
16.02.2011 SH SCR162227 Extended population of MULT
15.12.2010 SH SCR16057 Drafts: Added new BDPC fields for update
03.05.2010 SH SCR15506 Added task "PopulateMULT" and changed task "Online" to
skip DRFT rows which already exists iin BDPC
@OPH101C6 uses OPH1015C permissions and button labels, OPH1016C is a submodule
.. calculate unique number for table MULT (MULTI_SELECTION)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DRFT_ID, DRFT_ADMNO, DRFT_CLNTNO, DRFT_DEBH_NO, DRFT_NAME_DEBTOR, DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT, DRFT_DUEDATE from :1/DRFT exception join :1/BDPC on BDPC_DRFT_ID = DRFT_ID left outer join :1/INVO on INVO_NO = DRFT_INVO_NO where DRFT_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and DRFT_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and DRFT_CURRENCY = ':4' and DRFT_DATEMONEYRECEIVED is null and (DRFT_INVO_NO = 0 or DRFT_INVO_NO > 0 and INVO_AACTUALI = DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT) :5 order by DRFT_DUEDATE, DRFT_ID for fetch only

Text.val: ... check if at least one row is selected, button "OK" has to be
-- Disbaled OK in the menu, if nothing is seleted (MULT_TAGGED = TRUE)

Text.valUnicode: Show only drafts where draft amount = payment amount
